April 13th-30th: Click HERE for 6th-12th Grade Updated Learning Plan Information
School is Closed Until Further Notice

div.span: Registration is now open for the Husky Early Learning Preschool Programs for the 2020-2021 School Year (3 yr old and 4 yr old programs) Children must be 3 or 4 years of age by Sept. 15th. Click on the link below to complete the survey to register your child. Should you have questions, or need additional information contact the Elementary Office at 641-435-4114

div.div: If you are a parent/guardian of an N-P student or a resident of the Nashua-Plainfield Community School District--we need your input.

The Nashua-Plainfield CSD is in the process of completing a Comprehensive Needs Assessment. This is done every 5 years. Parent and community member feedback is very important to this process. The data collected from the following survey will be used to create short and long term school improvement goals.
Feel free to share this survey with parents or community members residing in the Nashua-Plainfield CSD. We would love to get over 500 responses! (It should take between 10-15 minutes to complete.)
Again, this survey is intended for parents/guardians of Nashua-Plainfield students and Nashua-Plainfield residents only.

span.span:
New Top Of Iowa Conference
Notify Me! Users Need New Account

To receive reminders of upcoming events and cancelation notices either via email or text messages through rSchoolToday, you need to create an account in the NEW Top Of Iowa Conference.
rSchoolTODAY is the on-line system the Top of Iowa Conference is using for athletic scheduling. With the move to the new conference, NP users of Notify Me! will need to create a new account in the new Top of Iowa Conference instead of the old Corn Bowl Conference site.
If you have signed up for Notify Me! in the past, you will need to create an account in the new Top of Iowa Conference. Click any of the Notify Me! to be taken to NP's Top of Iowa Conference webpage. Once there, click on the Notify Me! link in the upper right of the screen.
By signing up for Notify Me!, you will be able to receive reminder notices for upcoming events for the activities you select. Also, you will receive notices when an event has been canceled or postponed.
click on one of the blue Notify Me! links to be taken to NP's TOI Conference page. Again, your old account will not be in effect due to the switch to the new conference.
